content:
I do not have personal experiences but based on customer reviews and ratings online, here are some companies that offer reliable private transport services in meghalaya:

1. meghalaya taxi services - they offer a variety of vehicles, including sedans and suvs, for hire in meghalaya with reliable and experienced drivers. 2. northeast taxi - a popular private cab company specializing in northeast india, offering comfortable cars and suvs with trained and trusted drivers. 3. balajee travels - a reliable cab service provider based in shillong offering comfortable and reasonably priced transportation services across meghalaya. 4. aparajita travels - a popular car rental and cab service provider offering a wide range of vehicles, including hatchbacks and suvs, with experienced and trustworthy drivers. it is recommended that you check the reviews, ratings and compare the prices of different service providers before finalizing your private transport in meghalaya.
